scripts.dev: concurrently "cross-env  ELEVENTY_ENV=development NODE_ENV=development start npx @11ty/eleventy --serve --port=8027" "cross-env ELEVENTY_ENV=development NODE_ENV=development start webpack --watch-poll --progress --hide-modules --config=node_modules/laravel-mix/setup/webpack.config.js"
scripts.prod: concurrently "cross-env NODE_ENV=production npx webpack --progress --hide-modules --config=node_modules/laravel-mix/setup/webpack.config.js" "cross-env NODE_ENV=production npx @11ty/eleventy"
